definition: The word "sämtlich" refers to the entirety or the whole of a group or collection. It is commonly used to describe a comprehensive or complete set of things, often implying that no exceptions or exclusions are present.

examples.german: Sämtliche Mitarbeiter waren bei der Besprechung anwesend.
examples.english: All employees were present at the meeting.

examples.german: Sämtliche Bewohner des Hauses wurden evakuiert.
examples.english: All the residents of the house were evacuated.
